allow: Bash(powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$c = Get-Content ''C:\\Users\\yarie\\source\\repos\\new-database-layer\\pacific-db-migration\\new-spa-structure.sql'' -Encoding Unicode -Raw; @\(''Snapshot_Media_i18n'',''Snapshot_GenericRequirement'',''Snapshot_UnitInCharge'',''Snapshot_EntityInCharge'',''Snapshot_Filter'',''Snapshot_Step_i18n''\) | ForEach-Object { $t = $_ $found = $c -match \(''CREATE TABLE \\[dbo\\]\\.\\['' + $t + ''\\]''\); Write-Output \(''{0}: {1}'' -f $t, $found\) }")
